mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (id, title, date, publisher, cover_url, type, content, is_recommended) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{date}, #{publisher}, #{coverUrl}, #{type}, #{content}, #{isRecommended})
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET title = #{title}, date = #{date}, publisher = #{publisher}, cover_url = #{coverUrl}, type = #{type}, content = #{content} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, date, publisher, content, cover_url AS coverUrl, type, is_recommended AS isRecommended FROM news WHERE is_recommended = 1 ORDER BY date DESC
